title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using the dynamic text content type, it does not have any effect on the displayed text.
OB: When applying the dynamic text content type, the text does not change dynamically based on the specified rules or conditions.
EB: When applying the dynamic text content type, the text should change dynamically based on the specified rules or conditions.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Go to the text settings
3. Apply the dynamic text content type
4. Verify if the displayed text changes based on the specified rules or conditions
